Orbiting Dres in the Ceres I with 3 other kerbals.. For Science!

Edited September 18, 2015 by nsgallup
he ded
Orbiting Eve with his (7 kerbals) crew, waiting for the next window for Kerbin. After that, Jool+Grand Tour and....
In my Minimus refinery, waiting for me to get around to finishing that project.
Probably sipping on gin and juice.
After convincing Jeb to get off the VAB as KSC needed it, he soon found a new toy:

On a LEO space station with Bob and Bill as he and the two others sneaked into the capsule and did the launch by themselves instead of letting the planned crew do it. They cut communication with the ground, so no one knows what they are doing up there; although they have about 230 days of supplies, so they will eventually get back down, and have to explain themselves...
Orbiting Earth and waiting for 64-bit update.
Playing kool in the astronaught complex...
Killing people in my new K-16
Dead. Sadly, he was consumed by the Hell Kraken after landing on his head when jumping out of a craft that had no parachutes.

Jeb, Bill, Bob, and Valentine are building the new space station at 250 kms in Kerbin orbit. The newbies are flying parts up in a Nertea mk IV shuttle, which sadly keeps crashing on landing. Oh well, at least the pioneers are safe (until Bob runs out of propellant).
dead.
Running test flights on experimental aircraft with Valentina, after I finally got around to saving the Original Four.
En route to duna in my newest base

I brought him back today. He was orbiting Mun for years together with a female enigneer because of a failed rescue mission.

But there were still only two Kerbals in the pod. So I guess they were only playing cards, counting the stars and doing other professional stuff. Nothing serious.
On route to Eeloo to rescue some joker who stranded himself on the surface of Eeloo. Inconveniently at approx 60 degrees South of the equator. Jeb is a tad worried that he didn't bring enough fuel...

In my latest game, Jeb is stuck in orbit around the Mun with just barely not enough fuel to make it back to Kerbin. Usually this wouldn't be too much of a problem - getting out and pushing has helped sole this problem in the past, but this time around, things are... ...different. I recently installed the New Horizons mod, which shuffles all the planets around and adds a ton of new ones, so the Mun and Kerbin are now both moons of a large gas giant. This is making things quite a bit more difficult, especially because there isn't a delta-V map handy, on top of all the usual early-career woes.

Currently he's in the Astronaut Complex but he's probably going to be sent on a Space Shuttle mission to the ISS for a year long stay or possibly a mission to Duna. I'm not sure yet but he's going to be going places soon.
Orbiting minmus
Dead.
He is dead... Yeah, you know, that happens to all of us and- OMG I MISS HIM SO MUCH!!
in a plane landed not far from the KSC (googletranslated)
My Jeb is mostly just messing around with space planes (although he still does some flights). He loves it.
